original_title: 実録! ! ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 24
overview: The 24th installment of a popular series that introduces all 10 episodes of carefully selected horror videos that have been posted. When I visited a certain famous haunted spot with my lover, there were many stone monuments lined up at the entrance of a pitch-black shrine. In the past, there was a murder case in this place, and it is said that the ghost of the victim sobbed at night.
title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 24
